text: Mishary Rashid Alafasy was born on September 5th, 1976. Qari Mishary bin Rashid Alafasy () is a Kuwaiti qāriʾ (speaker of the Quran), imam, and preacher. He studied in the Islamic University of Madinah's College of Qur'an the ten qira'at and tafsir. == Awards == On October 25 2008, Alafasy was awarded the first Arab Creativity Oscar by the Arab Creativity Union in Egypt. The event was sponsored by the Secretary-General of the Arab League, Amr Moussa to recognize Alafasy for promoting Islam and the Quran. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1976 births Category:Islamic University of Madinah alumni Category:Quran reciters Category:Imams Category:People who memorized the Quran Category:Kuwaiti people
title: Mishary bin Rashid Alafasy
